text: aur aap unake saath rahen, jo apane paalanahaar kee praatah-sandhya bandagee karate hain. ve usakee prasannata chaahate hain aur aapakee aankhen saansaarik jeevan kee shobha ke lie[1] unase na phirane paayen aur usakee baat na maanen, jisake dil ko hamane apanee yaad se nishchet kar diya aur usane manamaanee kee aur jisaka kaam hee ullanghan (avagya karana) hai
